meanings.definition: The quality or state of being oval in shape.
meanings.sent1: The ovalnesses of the egg made it stand out among the round fruits.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the ovalnesses of the face in the portrait.
meanings.sent3: The ovalnesses of the balloon made it look like a giant egg floating in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an ovalnesses that seemed to brighten the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The ovalnesses of the lake reflected the sky like a mirror.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having an oval shape.
meanings.sent1: The ovalnesses of the table made it fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The ovalnesses of the mirror made it ideal for checking your outfit.
meanings.sent3: The ovalnesses of the cake made it look like a giant donut.
meanings.sent4: The ovalnesses of the moon in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The ovalnesses of the window framed the view beautifully.
